events.message: The candidate submitted their application for the software engineer position early this morning, showing strong interest in our development team.
After reviewing the candidate's resume and cover letter, the application was categorized under the engineering department to proceed with technical evaluation.
A recruiter was assigned to the candidate to guide them through the software engineer hiring process and coordinate further steps.
Conducted an initial screening call focusing on the candidateâ€™s experience with software development and devops practices to assess suitability.
The candidate responded positively to the initial screening feedback and expressed eagerness to move forward with the technical interview stage.
Scheduled the technical interview with engineering leads, confirming the candidate is available next Monday for an in-depth coding and problem-solving session.
